title: Agatha Heterodyne and the Airship City
description: In a time when the Industrial Revolution has become an all-out war, Mad Science rules the World...with mixed success. At Transylvania Polygnostic University, Agatha Clay was a student with trouble concentrating and rotten luck. Dedicated to her studies but unable to build anything that actually "worked," she seemed destined for a lackluster career as a minor lab assistant. But then the University was overthrown and Agatha was taken aboard the giant airship "Castle Wulfenbach" -- where it begins to look like she might carry a spark of Mad Science after all.
author: Phil Foglio
